title: SocialLink: Linking DBpedia Entities to Corresponding Twitter Accounts
segmentation: The idea was to try to get the best of both worlds from the knowledge base.

The shortcoming of social media, of course, is that this knowledge that's contained in social media is really hard to extract because the data is mostly unstructured.

You can facilitate tasks like user profiling and interlinking event detection, community detection labeling and on the other hand, if you can extract some knowledge from social media and bring it back to a linked open data cloud, you can directly import this knowledge to the knowledge base.
